name: Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon
name_original: Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon
description:
Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon is an action, adventure and arcade game developed by Cinemaware. It was originally released in 1987. It was published by Cinemaware.
Sinbad and the Throne of the Falcon is available on Atari ST, Apple II, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
